data.comment: The match is underway in Valencia.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elche needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 5, In Valencia Levante attack through Jorge De Frutos Sebastian. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 9, Elche have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In Valencia, Dani Gomez of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gonzalo Melero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Levante.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Levante.
Goal! Levante take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Gonzalo Melero.
That's a fine assist from Jose Campana.
In the minute 15, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Elche, close to Levante's area.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 19, Levante have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Levante to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Valencia.
Elche's Pere Milla gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Levante defender.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Elche.
Levante's Jose Campana is on target but unsuccessful.
Levante's Jorge De Frutos Sebastian gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Elche have a goal kick.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Elche.
Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Levante.
In the minute 32, Free kick Elche.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Diego Gonzalez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Diego Gonzalez is back on his feet again.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Levante throw-in in Elche's half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Elche close to the penalty box.
Pere Milla (Elche) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Elche's Raul Guti gets in a shot on goal at Ciutat de Valencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Elche.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Lucas Boye (Elche) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 40, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Carlos Clerc (Levante) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 43, Important block from the Elche defence as Jose Luis Morales fires in a strike for Levante.
Levante push forward at Ciutat de Valencia and Gonzalo Melero gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elche defence.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
At Ciutat de Valencia the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Valencia.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Elche.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche.
Throw-in high up the field for Levante in Valencia.
In the minute 49, Elche will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Levante.
Levante's Gonzalo Melero attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Elche in the half of Levante.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Josan of Elche smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Levante.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Elche are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 58, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sergio Postigo.
In Valencia Elche drive forward through Josan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Levante's Sergio Postigo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 60, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Can Elche capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal! Tete Morente equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 64, Josema instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 65, Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ruben Rochina is replacing Dani Gomez for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Elche.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Tete Morente (Elche) has received a yellow card from Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 69, Elche needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Elche.
In the minute 71, Elche push forward at Ciutat de Valencia and Gonzalo Verdu gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Levante defence.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Levante drives forward and Mickael Malsa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 73, Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paco Lopez is making the team's second substitution at Ciutat de Valencia with Nemanja Radoja replacing Gonzalo Melero.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Jorge De Frutos Sebastian with Roger Marti.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Levante.
In the minute 78, Levante have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
The away team have replaced Raul Guti with Omenuke Mfulu. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Almiron.
Levante are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 80, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ruben Vezo for Levante who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Diego Gonzalez for Elche has been booked by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Paco Lopez (Levante) is making a fourth substitution, with Sergio Leon replacing Jose Luis Morales.
Paco Lopez (Levante) is making a fifth change, with Oscar Duarte replacing the possibly injured Ruben Vezo.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Elche.
Gonzalo Verdu of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 84, Levante have a goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Elche at Ciutat de Valencia.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Levante.
In the minute 88, At Ciutat de Valencia, Omenuke Mfulu has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Levante capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
In the minute 89, Sergio Leon for Levante drives towards goal at Ciutat de Valencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Valencia Levante drive forward through Roger Marti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Elche.
Elche have a goal kick.
Levante's Mickael Malsa breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Elche a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a second substitution, with Guido Carrillo replacing Lucas Boye.
